divs: Sighting DetailsWent out for a smoke and was watching the sky. Saw a star-like object to the west that was flashing red, green and blue every 2 seconds. T first when I saw it it remained rather still, until it darted from left to right in less than a second. If you hold your hand up to the sky the sitnace would be about a spread finger's worth. I called my sister outside and see verified it wasn't a plane. We live in the OIA landing corridor about 3 miles out. I tried to get photos from my phone but it is a POS Nokia low-end. This object while I was watching it turned a slow circle like it was banking, and then proceeded to the west and dsiappeared.
trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around March 21st 2009
